l:dependency.name: Metrics Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin exposes the Metrics API to Jenkins plugins.

l:dependency.name: JVM Integration for Metrics
l:dependency.l:description: A set of classes which allow you to monitor critical aspects of your Java Virtual Machine using Metrics.

l:dependency.name: Metrics Integration for Servlets
l:dependency.l:description: An instrumented filter for servlet environments.

l:dependency.name: Metrics Core
l:dependency.l:description: Metrics is a Java library which gives you unparalleled insight into what your code does in production. Metrics provides a powerful toolkit of ways to measure the behavior of critical components in your production environment.

l:dependency.name: Metrics Health Checks
l:dependency.l:description: An addition to Metrics which provides the ability to run application-specific health checks, allowing you to check your application's heath in production.

l:dependency.name: Jackson Integration for Metrics
l:dependency.l:description: A set of Jackson modules which provide serializers for most Metrics classes.
